meanings.definition: The quality or state of being outlandish.
meanings.sent1: The outlandishnesses of his outfit drew attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: Her outlandishnesses in fashion always make her stand out.
meanings.sent3: The outlandishnesses of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The outlandishnesses of his ideas were like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The outlandishnesses of the painting left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being bizarre or unconventional.
meanings.sent1: The outlandishnesses of the movie plot kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: His outlandishnesses in behavior always surprise us.
meanings.sent3: The outlandishnesses of her cooking experiment made us curious.
meanings.sent4: The outlandishnesses of the design were a bold statement.
meanings.sent5: The outlandishnesses of the performance left the audience in awe.
